decks.notes: This deck focuses on generating a large amount of mana quickly through rituals and medallions to cast powerful spells like Ral, Monsoon Mage and Past in Flames. It also utilizes cards like Reckless Impulse and Valakut Awakening to draw more cards and dig for combo pieces. The deck aims to storm off and overwhelm the opponent with a combination of burn spells and card advantage, ultimately leading to a game-winning sequence of spells that can be cast in rapid succession. The key strategy is to maximize mana efficiency and card draw to set up explosive turns.

The main focus of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while putting pressure on them with aggressive creatures. It also aims to control the board with removal spells and versatile creatures. The deck includes a mix of disruptive spells like Teferi, Time Raveler and Prismatic Ending, as well as aggressive threats like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements and ensure consistency in playing spells. Overall, the deck aims to be a versatile and disruptive force in Modern 1 vs 1 matches.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana through cards like Utopia Sprawl and Eldrazi Temple to quickly play powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and Sire of Seven Deaths. It also utilizes control elements such as Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big threats while also having the tools to deal with their threats effectively. By combining ramp and control, this deck can outvalue and outpace opponents in a Modern 1 vs 1 setting.

The deck focuses on quickly reanimating powerful creatures using Goryo's Vengeance and Faithful Mending, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with Thoughtseize and Force of Negation. Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Psychic Frog provide additional value and control elements, while Quantum Riddler offers card advantage. The deck also includes removal spells like Prismatic Ending and Solitude to deal with threats. The mana base includes lands that can fetch necessary colors and support the deck's strategy. The goal is to assemble the combo pieces and win the game efficiently and decisively.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with aggressive creatures like Territorial Kavu, Scion of Draco, and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer. The deck also includes powerful enchantments like Leyline Binding and Leyline of the Guildpact to control the battlefield. Lightning Bolt provides additional removal and burn potential. The mana base is optimized with fetch lands like Arid Mesa and Wooded Foothills, along with a variety of dual lands. The deck aims to apply consistent pressure and disrupt opponent's strategies to secure a quick victory.

This deck focuses on fast, aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu to quickly overwhelm the opponent. Leyline Binding and Leyline of the Guildpact help to protect your creatures and increase their power. Stubborn Denial provides some counterplay to opponent's spells, while Doorkeeper Thrull and Consign to Memory offer additional disruption. Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury serves as a powerful finisher. The mana base includes a mix of lands to ensure consistent casting of spells. This deck aims to close out games quickly through aggressive creature plays and efficient removal.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures like Ragavan and Solitude to apply pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Prismatic Ending. Quantum Riddler and Consign to Memory provide card advantage and flexibility, while Phlage and Phelia act as finishers. The deck also features some control elements with board wipes like Wrath of the Skies and removal like Lightning Bolt. Overall, the deck aims to quickly deploy threats and disrupt the opponent's strategy to win the game efficiently.

The main focus of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly and aggressively rush down the opponent with low-cost, efficient creatures and burn spells. It aims to apply constant pressure on the opponent while also disrupting their game plan with spells like Lightning Bolt and Mutagenic Growth. The deck utilizes card draw and selection spells like Preordain and Expressive Iteration to maintain card advantage and find the right answers at the right time. Overall, the key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and relentless assault combined with burn spells for reach.

The main focus of this deck is to control and disrupt the opponent's strategy using powerful Eldrazi creatures and spells while assembling the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Tower, Urza's Power Plant, Urza's Mine) to generate a large amount of mana. Karn, the Great Creator is used to search for key artifacts, while Thought-Knot Seer and Sire of Seven Deaths provide additional disruption. Ugin, the Spirit Dragon and Ugin's Labyrinth help to control the board, with Mind Stone and Expedition Map providing additional mana ramp and card advantage. The goal is to overwhelm and outlast the opponent in a longer game.

The main idea of this deck is to use cards that focus on milling your opponent's deck, forcing them to draw from an empty library and lose the game. This strategy is supported by cards like Hedron Crab, Ruin Crab, and Fractured Sanity, as well as the use of Archive Trap and Surgical Extraction to maximize mill potential. The deck also includes control elements like Drown in the Loch and Fatal Push to deal with threats, while also having a bit of card draw and manipulation with Preordain and Visions of Beyond.

The main concept of this deck is to use the synergy between artifacts and creatures to overwhelm the opponent quickly. By utilizing cards like Kappa Cannoneer and Pinnacle Emissary alongside powerful artifacts like Mox Opal and Urza's Saga, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent from the very beginning. Engineered Explosives and Metallic Rebuke provide control elements to disrupt the opponent's strategy, while cards like Tormod's Crypt and Shadowspear help to deal with graveyard strategies and problematic creatures. The deck's speed and versatility make it a formidable Aggro - Affinity archetype in Modern 1 vs 1 format.

The deck aims to quickly reanimate powerful creatures like Griselbrand using cards like Goryo's Vengeance, while also controlling the board with counter spells like Force of Negation and removal spells like Prismatic Ending. Ephemerate and Faithful Mending provide card advantage and consistency, and Atraxa, Grand Unifier helps to protect your key combo pieces. Thoughtseize helps disrupt your opponent's strategy, and Solitude offers additional removal. The deck is focused on quickly assembling its combo pieces and overwhelming the opponent with powerful threats.

The deck is focused on utilizing the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Mine, Tower, and Power Plant) to ramp up mana quickly and cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and Thought-Knot Seer. It also includes control elements such as Karn, the Great Creator and All Is Dust to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck aims to control the game through powerful creatures and spells while maintaining a strong board presence and overwhelming the opponent with its threats.

This deck focuses on disrupting your opponent's game plan while applying pressure with efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury. The deck includes a mix of removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Prismatic Ending, along with disruption tools like Teferi, Time Raveler and Spell Snare. Ephemerate provides value by blinking creatures like Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Quantum Riddler. The deck also includes card advantage engines like Consign to Memory and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to stay ahead in the game. The deck aims to outpace opponents with a mix of disruption and aggressive threats.

The deck focuses on filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures and then bringing them back to the battlefield using reanimation spells like Unearth and Persist. This allows the player to quickly overwhelm their opponent with big creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Emperor of Bones. Thoughtseize helps to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while Faithless Looting and Thought Scour provide card selection and graveyard filling. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push to deal with threats. Superior Spider-Man is included as a versatile finisher and protection against removal.

The main focus of the deck is to utilize the Allosaurus Rider combo with Eldritch Evolution and Neoform to quickly tutor and cheat out powerful creatures such as Griselbrand, Atraxa, Grand Unifier, and Ghalta, Stampede Tyrant. The deck also includes various ways to protect the combo with cards like Pact of Negation and Veil of Summer. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Consign to Memory and Planar Genesis to control the board and generate value. Overall, the deck aims to assemble its combo pieces quickly and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures.
